title: Interactive Matplotlib Visualization Techniques
description: This lab aims to introduce you to the concept of picking in Matplotlib. The ability to pick artists is a powerful tool that can be used to build interactive visualizations that respond to user actions. We will cover simple picking, picking with custom hit test functions, picking on a scatter plot, and picking images.

meta.description: Learn how to build interactive data visualizations using Matplotlib's picking feature, including simple picking, custom hit tests, and picking on scatter plots and images.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, data visualization, interactive, picking, scatter plot, image

i18n.title: Техники интерактивной визуализации в Matplotlib
i18n.description: Цель этого практического занятия - познакомить вас с концепцией подбора в Matplotlib.
